Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi's crucial sixes in the final overs
Abbas Afridi's dismissal caught at long-on
Imad Wasim's key wickets including Gareth Delany and Barry McCarthy
Shaheen Afridi's early breakthroughs dismissing Andrew Balbirnie and Lorcan Tucker
Haris Rauf's wicket of Curtis Campher
Mohammad Amir's wicket of Paul Stirling
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and elected to bowl
Naseem Shah was not playing, Abbas Afridi came in
Ben White replaced Craig Young for Ireland
Pitch report indicated wetness in the outfield and some grass on the wicket
Miscellaneous Highlights: Weather forecast indicated a 40% chance of rain
Historical head-to-head statistics: Pakistan had won all previous T20 World Cup encounters against Ireland
